source/maxent/mmapfile.h

00001 /*
00002  * vi:ts=4:tw=78:shiftwidth=4:expandtab
00003  * vim600:fdm=marker
00004  *
00005  * mmapfile.h  -  A platform independent mmap wrapper
00006  *
00007  * Copyright (C) 2004 by Zhang Le <ejoy@users.sourceforge.net>
00008  * Begin       : 29-May-2004
00009  * Last Change : 22-May-2005.
00010  * 
00011  * USEAGE:
00012  *   if mmap support is identified on the system on which this file is compiled,
00013  *   a macro HAVE_SYSTEM_MMAP will be defined. Then you can write your mmap
00014  *   supporting code like:
00015  *
00016  *   #if defined (HAVE_SYSTEM_MMAP)
00017  *      int rc;
00018  *      mmap_info mi;
00019  *      rc = mmap_open(&mi, file, mode, flags); // create a file mapping
00020  *      if (rc)
00021  *          ...  // mmap failed
00022  *      ...
00023  *
00024  *      `mi.addr' now points to the mapped address of the whole file
00025  *      `mi.size' is the size of the mmapped memory in bytes
00026  *      ...
00027  *
00028  *      rc = mmap_close(&mi);  // close the file mapping
00029  *      if (rc)
00030  *          ...  // unmmap failed
00031  *   #endif
00032  *
00033  *   Currently only mapping with shared reading is implemented. Do not attempt to
00034  *   write to the mapped address `addr'. The code should work on both unix
00035  *   platform that supports mmap(2) call or Win32 platform (mingw & cygwin). 
00036  *
00037  *   This file should work out of the box on Linux/FreeBSD/Win32. However on
00038  *   system unknown to the file, you may want to use autoconf macro
00039  *   AC_FUNC_MMAP to check the existence of working mmap(2) first. Otherwise
00040  *   these routines will not be available.
00041  *
00042  *   A C++ wrapper class is provided in `mmapfile.hpp'.
00043  *
00044  * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a
00045  * copy of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"),
00046  * to deal in the Software without restriction, including without limitation
00047  * the rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense,
00048  * and/or sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the
00049  * Software is furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
00050  * 
00051  * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in
00052  * all copies or substantial portions of the Software.
00053  * 
00054  * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
00055  * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
00056  * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL
00057  * THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
00058  * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING
00059  * FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER
00060  * DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE.
00061  */
00062 
00063 #ifndef MMAPFILE_H
00064 #define MMAPFILE_H
00065 
00066 /* checking for the existence of mmap call {{{*/
00067 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00068 #include <config.h>
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 #if defined(HAVE_MMAP) /* autoconf checks it for us */
00072     #define  USE_POSIX_MMAP
00073 #else
00074     #if defined(__FreeBSD__) || defined(__linux__)
00075         #define USE_POSIX_MMAP
00076     #elif defined(WIN32) || defined(__CYGWIN__)
00077         #define USE_WIN32_MMAP
00078         #include <windows.h>
00079     #else
00080         #warning "Unknown platform for mmap wrapper"
00081     #endif
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 #if defined(USE_POSIX_MMAP) || defined(USE_WIN32_MMAP)
00085     #define HAVE_SYSTEM_MMAP 1
00086 #else
00087     #undef HAVE_SYSTEM_MMAP
00088 #endif
00089 /*}}}*/
00090 
00091 #if defined(HAVE_SYSTEM_MMAP)
00092 
00093 #include <stdio.h>
00094 
00095 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00096 extern "C" {
00097 #endif
00098 
00099 typedef struct {
00100     unsigned long  size;
00101     int            fd;
00102     FILE          *fp;
00103     void          *addr;
00104     int            flags;
00105 
00106 #if defined(USE_WIN32_MMAP)
00107     HANDLE win32_fh;
00108     HANDLE win32_view;
00109 #endif
00110 } mmap_info;
00111 
00112 int mmap_open(mmap_info* info, const char* file, const char* mode, int flags);
00113 int mmap_close(mmap_info* info);
00114 
00115 #if defined(__cplusplus)
00116 }
00117 #endif
00118 
00119 #endif /* ifndef HAVE_SYSTEM_MMAP */
00120 
00121 #endif /* ifndef MMAPFILE_H */
